titles.title: HALOS Act of 2025
HALOS Act of 2025
Helping Angels Lead Our Startups Act of 2025

A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to revise rules relating to general solicitation or general advertising to allow for presentations or other communication made by or on behalf of an issuer at certain events, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
